Package model

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
model.GameManager
public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the Game Manager. The Game Manager has several attributes and methods storing any implementation of the DAOs.
Version:
22/5/2021
Author:
Riccardo Giacalone (ricardo.giacalone@students.salle.url.edu), Guillermo Gonzalez (guillermo.g@students.salle.url.edu), Oscar Cubeles (oscar.cubeles@students.salle.url.edu), Goddy Clinton (weriwohmbang.g@students.salle.url.edu)
